activities:
Cushman & Wakefield may need to transfer, process, and control certain European Union personnel data of its affiliated companies, subject, however, to applicable laws and regulations.  Such data may be characterized as Personal Information including, as may be necessary, Sensitive Information.  For these purposes:  

Personal Information shall mean any information about an identified or identifiable individual, regardless of the medium or format in which the information is stored. 

Sensitive Information shall mean Personal Information treated by European data protection laws as posing special risks to individuals, such as information about racial or ethnic origin, political opinions, religious or philosophical beliefs, trade-union membership, health, or sex life. Other categories of Personal Information subject to special protections in some European countries include information about criminal history, civil judgments, administrative sanctions, government security measures, government-issued ID numbers, biometric data, genetic data, geo-location data, personality profiling, and information in the context of “whistleblowing.” 

For illustrative purposes, Cushman & Wakefield may need to use information about an employee’s name, citizenship, contact details, compensation, roles and skills for purposes of making decisions pertaining to:  personnel and compensation administration, including salary, bonus and stock plan programs; optimizing global organizational structure and management (e.g., personnel assignments and recruitment); personnel benefits (e.g., insurance programs), personnel development (e.g., training program development) and performance management; facility management and operations; providing information technology support and services; and legal matters pertaining to regulatory and legal compliance, and financial affairs, and monitoring and enforcing compliance with company policies and procedures.

personaldata: The data covered for purposes of this application is human resource data that may be processed off-line, on-line, or manually processed.
recoursemech: Cushman & Wakefield and its subsidiaries will cooperate with applicable EU data protection authorities (DPAs) or such authorities designated representatives.
